'''Dior''' ([[Third Age]] {{TA|2328|n}}<ref name="Elendil">{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 204</ref> – {{TA|2435|n}},<ref>{{App|South}}</ref> aged 107 years) was the ninth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]]. 

==History==
Dior was the last Ruling Steward during the period of the [[Watchful Peace]].<ref>{{App|TA}}</ref>

Dior, having had no children, was succeeded by his sister [[Rían (daughter of Steward Barahir)|Rían]]'s son [[Denethor I]].<ref name="Elendil"/>

==Etymology==
For the meaning of his name refer to [[Dior#Etymology|Dior - Etymology]]. Dior was probably named after the son of [[Beren]] and [[Lúthien]] of the [[First Age]].<ref>{{NM|P2v}}, footnote 3, p. 189</ref>
